Content: Inspector of Police of the Police Narcotics Bureau Neomal Rangajeeva and former Prisons Superintendent Emil Ranjan Lamahewa have been further remanded until the 18th of September. They have been further remanded under the order of the Colombo Fort Magistrateâ€™s Court. They are accused of opening fire and killing 27 inmates of the Welikada Prisons in 2012. The Colombo High Court had earlier dismissed revision petitions seeking bail for the suspects. An analysis report with resepct to the 25 T-56 firearms during investigations related to the incident has been directed to the Government Analyst. The Criminal Investigations Department informed the Court that these reports had not yet been received.
